channel.title: Fe Efficiency on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Fe Efficiency on funPlantGenes

item.title: AhFRDL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AhFRDL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhFRDL1-mediated citrate secretion contributes to adaptation to iron deficiency and aluminum stress in peanuts.

item.title: MtCIPK12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g086380 Gene Symbol: MtCIPK12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Protein kinase MtCIPK12 modulates iron reduction in Medicago truncatula by regulating riboflavin biosynthesis.

item.title: OsHORZ1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g64250 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0861700 Gene Symbol: OsHORZ1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 ,Â IRGSP-1.

item.title: ZmFDR4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZmFDR4 Gene Name: Fe deficiency-related 4 Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Zea mays Fe deficiency-related 4 (ZmFDR4) functions as an iron transporter in the plastids of monocots.
